description.english: Earned for getting a Perfect Bonus.
Earned for finishing in under 15 seconds.
Earned for earning 5,000 points in Zappo Raiders.
Earned for earning 10,000 points in Zappo Raiders.
Earned for earning 100 points in the Net Game.
Earned for beating one of everything.
Earned for reaching 1 hour of playtime.
Earned for reaching 10 hours of playtime.
Earned for walking a mile in Bouapha's shoes.
Earned for traveling over 100 miles on foot.
Earned for rafting over one mile.
Earned for driving and carting over five miles.
Earned for buying all Frozen Yogurts.
Earned for buying all Major Awards.
Earned for emptying out the entire mall.
Earned for getting 500,000 points on Dig Man IV.
Earned for getting 75,000 points on Cave Zoomer.
Earned for opening a certain locker.
Earned for beating Happy Stick Man 10 times.
Earned for beating the Dust Devil.
Earned for beating a level with an alternate character.
Earned for beating a level as Shtupid Shroom.
Earned for beating a monster while time is stopped.
Earned for beating a fiery monster with the Toaster.
Earned for beating an icy monster while it's frozen.
Earned for beating 200 of all Vampire types combined.
Earned for spearing a Vampire while Garlic'd.
Earned for falling in water with an Energy Barrier on.
Earned for winning "Who Doesn't Want To Be A Moron?".
Earned for opening a certain locker.
Earned for holding your breath for an hour.
Earned for getting 100% on a world.
Earned for getting 100% on all worlds.
Earned for opening a certain locker.
Earned for opening a different locker.
Earned for entering a secret level.
Earned for completing the Super Secret Surprise.
Earned for getting 10 Keys Of Lunacy.
Earned for collecting 100 keys of any color.
Earned for collecting 20 coins in a level.
Earned for holding 25,000 coins in hand.
Earned for surviving the Petting Zoo.
Earned for masterful driving skills at the Mall.
Earned for beating something with bubbles.
Earned for smashing a Roly Poly to bits.
Earned for getting the other 99 goals.
